mutants.original_line: carry = a & b  # carry is the common set bits of a and b
a = a ^ b     # sum of bits without considering carry
b = carry << 1  # carry is shifted by one bit to the left
b = carry << 1  # carry is shifted by one bit to the left
b = carry << 1  # carry is shifted by one bit to the left
b = carry << 1  # carry is shifted by one bit to the left
